form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: STATEMENT OF FACTSS FOR PREPARATION OF PETITION, 330160

full_text: Screened by NARA 7/24/2023 3 330160 ALIEN REGISTRATION Name Man Get Wong STATEMENT OF FACTS FOR PREPARATION OF PETITION SECTION OF LAW 31/a No. A13 559 853 (1) My full, true, and correct name is Man Get Wong (Full, true name, without abbreviations) 90046 (2) My present place of residence is 854 N. Crescent Hgts Blvd Los Angeles, California (Number and street) (City or town) (County) (State) (3) I was born on Aug. 22 1914 in Kwang Tung China (Month) (Day) (Year) (City or town) (County, district, province, or State) (Country) (4) I am married and have (7) living children. The first name of my husband or wife is (was) Pui-fun- (Single; married; divorced; widowed) we were married on April 10th 1943 at Canton China ; he or she was born (Month) (Day) (Year) (City or town) (State or country) Canton China at on April 21th 1920 ; (City or town) (County, district, province, or State) (Country) (Month) (Day) (Year) entered the United States at HLL (Honolulu) Hawaii on Nov 16th 1962 for permanent residence in (City or town) (State) (Month) (Day) (Year) with me the United States and now resides apart from me at ; and was naturalized (Show full address if not living with you) on at Certificate No. (Month) (Day) (Year) (City or town) (State) or became a citizen by ; his or her Alien Registration No. is A13 559 873 (5) I was lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence on April 8th 1966 ; under the name (Month) (Day) (Year) of Man Get Wong at Los Angeles, Calif. on the President Wilson (City) (State) (Name of vessel or other means of conveyance) (6) I have resided continuously in the United States of America since Nov. 27th 1962 4-866 Q and continuously in the State of California where I now live since XXXXX March 1964 4866 e and during the past 5 years I have been physically present in the United States for an aggregate period of (60) months. (7) I (have, have not) previously filed petition for naturalization No. on (Month) (Day) (Year) at in the (City) (State) (8) I wish the naturalization court to change my name to None (Give full name desired or state "None") (9) Since such lawful admission, I have not been absent from the United States (for a period or periods of 6 months or longer) except as follows (if none, state "None") DEPARTED FROM THE UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES DATE VESSEL OR OTHER MEANS DATE VESSEL OR OTHER MEANS PORT (Month, day, year) OF CONVEYANCE PORT (Month, day, year) OF CONVEYANCE None (10) I have (7) children: (Complete columns (a) to (h) as to each child. If child lives with you, state "with me" in column (h), otherwise (No.) give city and State of child's residence.) (a) Given Names (b) Sex (c) Place Born (d) Date (e) Date Born (f) Port of Entry (g) Alien (Country) of Entry Registration No. (h) Now Living At- FOIA (b)(6) Los Angeles Wong, Mee Kuen Female China 2-29-45 11-16-62 Hawaii California Wong, Tak Chung Male China 8-9-46 11-16-62 Hawaii Los Angeles California Wong, Tak Shun Male China 10-5-47 11-16-62 Hawaii Los Angeles California FOIA (b)(6) nother
